headline: Dedicated to clean, readable, and bug-free code.

body.content: I am reaching out to apply for the front-end engineer position. Although I did not follow a traditional computer science education, I have acquired the necessary skills to create polished and reliable user interfaces.
My background is unconventional, which highlights my ability to adapt and learn quickly:
I pursued artistic studies, including illustration, a year of training in digital special effects, and finally, a graphic design program.
I worked for five years in a data marketing and emailing agency, where I advanced to the position of head of data marketing and emailing.

Aware of the need to improve my English, I decided to tackle this challenge by moving to Australia. While there, with more time on my hands, I rethought my career goals and trained to become a developer. I learned JavaScript and the React framework.
Upon returning to Belgium, I applied this training by working for two and a half years as a front-end developer, contributing to the development of a SaaS ERP software interface.

This atypical journey is a testament to my problem-solving abilities, quick learning, and adaptability. I am confident that these qualities will enable me to effectively contribute to your team by finding solutions to the challenges we may face together.
Furthermore, despite my self-taught background, I am meticulous and committed to writing clean, readable, and bug-free code.
I am looking forward to the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your company.
Thank you for considering my application.
